content: color options also make for vibrant fruit theme modifications instead of a magic_ring you can ch4 and slip_stitch to the first chain to form a ring to work in to create the diamond mesh you will work your slip stitches into the 4th chain or top of each diamond as described in the pattern below bag round 1 create a magic_ring and work 12 double_crochet into the ring 12 slip_stitch to first st to join round 2 work 2dc into each st around 24 slip_stitch to join round 3 2dc in first st double_crochet in next st *2dc in next st double_crochet in next st* repeat * * around 36 slip_stitch to join pattern continued round 4 2dc in first st double_crochet in next 2 sts *2dc in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat * * around 48 slip_stitch to join place a marker into this first stitch round 5 *ch7 skip 2 sts slip_stitch into next st* 15 times there should be 2 sts remaining ch4 and double_crochet into the same space at the stitch marker this is the first round of your diamond mesh you will be working into the 4th chain/top of each diamond all the way around rounds 6 - 20 working in a spiral *ch7 slip_stitch into the top of the next diamond* all the way around at the end of round 6 place a second stitch marker into the sl st you make on the diamond directly above the first stitch marker you will move this marker up at the end of each even round to keep track of the beginning of the round end round 20 with the slip_stitch that you move the stitch marker into round 21 *ch4 and slip_stitch to top of the next diamond* all the way around ending with the slip_stitch into the last ch7 before the stitch marker round 22 work 4hdc into each ch4 space around slip_stitch to join 68 pattern continued round 23 half_double_crochet into first 11 sts ch30 skip 12 sts and half_double_crochet into the 13th st from hook half_double_crochet into the next 21 sts ch30 skip 12 and half_double_crochet into the 13th st from hook half_double_crochet in remaining 11 sts slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet to join 68 round 24 half_double_crochet in each st and chain around slip_stitch to join 68 fo and weave in ends stuff sack - second panel round 1 create a magic_ring and work 12 double_crochet into the ring 12 slip_stitch to first st to join round 2 work 2dc into each st around 24 slip_stitch to join round 3 2dc in first st double_crochet in next st *2dc in next st double_crochet in next st* repeat * * around 36 slip_stitch to join round 4 2dc in first st double_crochet in next 2 sts *2dc in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat * * around 48 slip_stitch to join do not fasten_off instead continue using the working yarn on the hook to join the panel to
